Package watchlist

Interface IWatchlistModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WatchlistModel
    public interface IWatchlistModel
    This interface specifies capabilities a watchlist model needs to have.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addStock​(Stock stock)
      Add a stock to the watchlist
      void clearWatchlist()
      Empty the watchlist.
      boolean contains​(Stock stock)
      Check if the watchlist contains a stock.
      Stock getStockBySymbol​(java.lang.String symbol)
      Get a reference to a stock in the watchlist by specifying its symbol
      java.util.ArrayList<Stock> getStockList()
      Get a list of stocks contained in the watchlist.
      void removeStock​(Stock stock)
      Removes a stock from the watchlist
      void updateStockPrice​(java.lang.String stockSymbol, double newPrice)
      Set a new price for the stock with the specified symbol.

    • Method Detail

      • addStock

        void addStock​(Stock stock)
        Add a stock to the watchlist
        Parameters:
        stock - the stock to be added

      • removeStock

        void removeStock​(Stock stock)
        Removes a stock from the watchlist
        Parameters:
        stock - the stock to be removed

      • contains

        boolean contains​(Stock stock)
        Check if the watchlist contains a stock.
        Parameters:
        stock - the stock to be checked for
        Returns:
        true, if the watchlist contains the specified stock

      • getStockBySymbol

        Stock getStockBySymbol​(java.lang.String symbol)
        Get a reference to a stock in the watchlist by specifying its symbol
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol that identifies the stock to get
        Returns:
        a reference to the stock with the specified symbol in the watchlist

      • updateStockPrice

        void updateStockPrice​(java.lang.String stockSymbol,
                      double newPrice)
        Set a new price for the stock with the specified symbol.
        Parameters:
        stockSymbol - the symbol of the stock to set the price for
        newPrice - the new price

      • getStockList

        java.util.ArrayList<Stock> getStockList()
        Get a list of stocks contained in the watchlist.
        Returns:
        a list of the stocks contained in the watchlist

      • clearWatchlist

        void clearWatchlist()
        Empty the watchlist.
